page.title: 18Leisure persuits in Evie
page.content: Many clubs and societies are run locally mainly using the community end of the school as a venue. For the youth of the parish, there are various sports clubs;{Netball, Football} and {Badminton}are played and a{Youth {Club}is also held.{Brownies}and{Guides cater for the young girls. Throughout the winter some classes are held, such as{Keep Fit, Bowling, {Spinning,}and{Basketry and straw-work. An active{Drama Club}do productions in local concerts and{Discos}and{Dances are held throughout the year. Many women take an active part in the{Women's Guild, Lifeboat Guild}and{ {W.R.I.}A{Sale of Work}is often held to raise money for a club or for some worthy cause. The church runs a{Bible Study Group and{Sunday School}in the church. .
